alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Grant; Hooker (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 3:24PM CDT until April 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Grant County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... * Until 415 PM CDT/315 PM MDT/. * At 324 PM CDT/224 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 21 miles southwest of Merritt Reservoir to 16 miles north of Whitman to 13 miles north of Hyannis, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brownlee, Whitman, Carr Lake, Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Speckel Meir Lake, Duluth, Mother Lake, Marsh Flat, Hire, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek, Sevenmile Hill, Weir and Hecla. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 152 and 174. Highway 61 between mile markers 164 and 180. Highway 97 between mile markers 73 and 97. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
